name: #HexDetective
description: Learn and practice to read hex colour codes

features: Playable on Chrome desktop widescreen

changelog.name: The Tutorial Update
features: Interactive Tutorial with 12 levels
bugs: It was possible for multiple persons to fit the description
Clicking 'New Game' after entering invalid difficulty settings caused a critical error

changelog.name: The UI Update
features: Redesigned the control panel
After accusing a person, a bar chart breakdown of the suspects colours is shown
If the choice was incorrect, a second breakdown is shown to compare the suspect with the accused
New button to completely hide ruled-out people
New button to unhide ruled-out people
New button to remove reset ruled-out status for all
Improved design and usability of interactive bar charts
New switch to auto-continue after a correct accusation
Selection Mode control is now disabled between rounds
bugs: Bar chart font and colour sliders appeared wrong in Firefox
Fixed font size differing between Chrome and Firefox

changelog.name: The Difficulty Update (work in progress)
features: Added a difficulty selection with 5 options
New difficulty parameter: Hue Bias - People will wear colours similar or different to the suspect's
New difficulty parameter: Saturation Range - Prevents or ensures greyness
New difficulty parameter: Value Range - Prevents or ensures darkness
New difficulty parameter: Multiple Lives
The title above the main menu now has a minimum saturation and value
Prettier confirmation dialog when returning to main menu

changelog.name: The Tooltip Update
features: Added tooltips

roadmap.name: The Mobile Update
features: Mobile support
Responsive Design Overhaul
Mobile: confirm choice to avoid missclick

roadmap.name: The Release Update
features: The Tutorial introduces UI elements one by one

roadmap.name: The Cosmetic Update
features: New hats
New shirts
New pants
New eyes

roadmap.name: Difficulty Update 2
features: Help texts to explain details, e.g. the fact that skirts are pants ;)

roadmap.name: The Cookie Update
features: Highscore
Highscore is preserved between sessions
German localisation
Each suspect gets a random name & crime
More animations for people
Sounds
Other game modes
